title: Weight Loss Tracker & BMI Calculator ‚Äì WeightFit
description:
This weight loss tracker will assist you in weight control and helps you to lose weight or reach your weight goal. The app also includes a BMI Calculator which calculates your BMI and your ideal weight. You can also define your own personal target weight.


Use the following features:
‚Ä¢ Track your daily weight
‚Ä¢ Integrated BMI Calculator
‚Ä¢ Analyze your weight history in various charts and visualizations to gain insights on the way to a better body image
‚Ä¢ Set a desired weight and follow your progress
‚Ä¢ Take a look on statistics about your weight, i.e. average weight, Body Mass Index (BMI), difference to the starting weight and even more.
‚Ä¢ Optional the app will remind you to track your weight in our diary
‚Ä¢ Input weights in the metric or imperial unit system
‚Ä¢ Sync your weight data with your Google Fit account


Track your weight and reach your desired weight because overweight and obesity are risk factors for diseases such as hypertension, heart disease and diabetes.


If you like our app, please leave a ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ-review!


If you have any feedback or suggestions, feel free to contact us via email: android@weightfit.appovo.com.

comments: I wanted an app to monitor my weight and plot it on a graph as I think actually seeing a line going down, (or up!), motivates me more to stick to my new diet. This exceeded my expectations showing my BMI, works out my target weight, stats, history etc. in 3 easy to read screens. Just what I was looking for! Fantastic app! 5*

Great App, keep it up. It would be nice if we could change the profile starting weight. My weight cycles up and down thrown the year and it works be nice to be able to set the starting point for the analytics as the current year not the entire logged history.

Great app, gives an average on the graph as well as as charting weight loss on a downward graph. Wish it forecasted the weight lost on the graph over future time.....it does tell you the number of days till your goal weight though.

Helps me hold myself accountable for my health by taking my medications on time, checking my blood sugar regularly, and motivates me to eat properly to reach a healthy weight. It is my accountability partner for self care!

Awesome app. Have been using it for about 2 or 3 years now and it does everything it adversities. Would recommend to anyone one. First got it for when I was powerlifting, now I'm using it to keep track while I do some body building work.

title: Monitor Your Weight
description:
Award Winning Weight Tracker App developed as a tool mainly to help motivate a person following a diet and/or exercise program to reach their desired target weight within a predefined period. 

* Winner of 7th Annual Best App Ever Awards under Health Category *
* Best App developed in Kuwait - Annual Informatics Awards * 

As the name indicates, you will be able to enter your weight on a regular basis and monitor your progress accordingly through means of statistics and graphs. You may also enter and track multiple profiles as well - monitor the progress of your family members, spouse, friends, colleagues - or simply create more than 1 profile for yourself to set partial targets until you reach your ultimate goal. 

This app will also suggest your ideal weight and recommend the amount of time needed to reach that target based on your current weight, height, body frame, gender and age. You may, of course, choose to alter the suggested targets based on your own plans. 

Main Features: 

- Weight tracker with option to track single or multiple profiles 
- Track various body measurements
- Option to synchronize your data between devices or to our server 
- Measurements may be represented in Kilos, Pounds, Stones, Meters or Feet 
- Calculates ideal weight based on age, height, gender and body frame 
- Full screen graph that shows your overall weight loss progress over time 
- BMI (Body Mass Index) calculated 
- Calculates daily calorie intake 
- Calculates percentage body fat 
- Total Weight Loss calculated 
- Remaining amount of weight calculated 
- Average Daily Loss calculated 
- Average Weekly Loss calculated 
- Overall progress calculated 
- Possibility to enter new weights at earlier dates 
- Displays an indicator to show the quality of your daily progress 
- PIN lock to secure your privacy 
- Multiple Language localization supporting over 15 languages 
- Possibility to export all your recorded data 
- Integration with digital scales: Withings, Aria, WiT

comments: This app is the best app ever and its only a couple of MB's too! I used it for 3 years now!!! Its the only app that helped me lose wieght and monitor it. Seeing the charts and progress helped motivate me. Other apps are just too "noisy" for me. They want to do everything and end up losing their identity. This app has been stable thoughtout these years. Always remained true to its purpose!

The app has proved itself invaluable in my daily health plan to track my weight. It provides a nice, tight, minimalist record of my efforts to keep things under control. One can only imagine where the developer might take it should be choose to expand it into other health management areas! (Not so subtle a hint and words of encouragement!)

My favorite weight tracking app. The graphs are helpful. I love that it shows you the current percentage of time that has passed between setting your goal/start date and your goal date and the current percentage of progress you've made through the goal you set. Helps keep me on track and know whether I've set an unreasonable goal or if I'm doing enough to actually meet the goal I planned and need to step my game up.

It lets you know how much weight you have lost as well as how much more you have to go. It also provides a BMI check which is helpful. There's a graphical representation of the weight change and it's kinda motivating to see it keep going go down. Overall ots a good app with no glitches or anything nor does it consume a great deal of battery or space in your phone.

This app is very comprehensive and easy to use. It allows for multiple profiles (I just have one for 2019, for 2020 etc to stop ths display becoming unmanageable) It provides a USEFUL graph - date gaps appear and are not compressed out - it's very configurable, allows goal setting/tracking, syncs well across devices and provides a host of info, BMI etc. It also seems to be Fitbit compatible (I don't have one). Would be 5* if the graph worked landscape too!

title: WW (Weight Watchers Reimagined)
description:
WW is ranked the #1 doctor-recommended weight-loss program*, and for the ninth year in a row, WW has been named ‚Äú#1 Best Diet for Weight Loss‚Äù by U.S. News & World Report. Download the WW (Weight Watchers) app today to get: access to food and fitness trackers, thousands of delicious recipes and expert science-backed techniques to help you lose weight, and all the support you need to reach your goals.

We‚Äôve introduced myWW‚Ñ¢, our most groundbreaking program ever! First, through a personal assessment, we learn about your unique needs and preferences, and then we match you with a customized weight loss plan fit for your lifestyle. Backed by the latest nutritional and behavioral science, myWW guides you toward a balanced diet and helps you build healthy habits for life. 

GET REWARDS FOR FOOD, FITNESS, & WEIGHT TRACKING

You‚Äôll learn to eat smarter and lose weight with a personalized SmartPoints¬Æ Budget and ZeroPoint‚Ñ¢ food list. Easily track what you eat using the Barcode Scanner or search our database of nearly 300,000 foods. 

The app‚Äôs activity tracker helps you make progress towards your fitness goals. We‚Äôll show you how to sync your fitness device and convert your daily moves into FitPoints¬Æ, our measurement for activity.

With over 8,000 WW recipes and 86,000 meals from nearly 400 popular restaurants, deciding what to eat is simple. Browse by selecting categories such as ‚ÄúQuick & Easy‚Äù to find delicious meals to satisfy any taste. Build and save dishes you love! Plus, whenever you track your food, activity, and weight, you earn ‚ÄúWins,‚Äù which you can trade for free WellnessWins‚Ñ¢ rewards. Instantly redeem amazing products and experiences in the app to keep you motivated on your journey. It‚Äôs all included with your membership!


24/7 COMMUNITY & LIVE COACHING

Get your daily dose of inspiration on the WW members-only social network, Connect. You‚Äôll meet members like you around the country, all working toward their individual goals. Plus, you can join groups based on your location, age, hobbies, interests, and goals, so you feel supported on your journey, wherever you are. Need expert guidance? You can chat with our WW Coaches anytime you need, right in our app, with 24/7 Live Coaching.


MEMBERSHIP PRICING & TERMS

WW Digital membership includes our food, activity, and weight tracking features, WellnessWins rewards program, 24/7 Live Coaching, access to our online community, and more.


*Based on a 2019 survey of 500 doctors who recommend weight-loss programs to patients.

Privacy Policy: https://www.weightwatchers.com/us/privacy/policy
Terms of Service: https://www.weightwatchers.com/us/termsandconditions/onlineplus-coaching

recentChanges: We've debugged and improved your app experience, worked on issues that caused crashes, and finetuned a handful of things behind the scenes, all to empower your WW journey and help you build habits for a happy, healthy life.
comments: I cannot believe I have signed up to pay money to use this app! I wish I could give it fewer than one star! I haven't been able to do the simplest tasks, such as adding a food to a listed meal, or changing quantities. The WORST part is that I find no help section for any guidance, which is why I am choosing to vent my frustration here publicly. This may just end my WW experience, since I chose it for its CONVENIENCE!! Ha, ha, ha!!

I really had high hopes for this app! However activity-tracking is not as they stated! What application doesn't include the Android Samsung health! I will try it for the week but I think I would rather pay $39 for my Fitbit pal for the year! That application does the same thing and it takes into consideration activity for the day and we'll adjust your daily caloric needs. If you don't care about your activity-tracking and you just want to log your food this is a great application from what I can

User interface is not intuitive. Have to use back button on phone too often to return to home screen. Database is random with no obvious way to search by category or in alphabetical order. Too many entries in database list foods in units of "serving(s)." Without a cross reference or recipe I don't know how much a serving should be. There are far better tracking apps (MyFitnessPal comes to mind.) but I have to use this one because none of the others calculate SP(As far as I can tell.).

So frustrated with ww app as of late, it started off perfect but over these last couple of weeks it has taken so long to load up and then so long to do simple tasks on there. I have uninstalled and reinstalled, I've deleted other apps on my phone to see if it helps but nothing has worked. PLEASE sort it out weight watchers I'm not using the app every day because it takes so long.

Had this app about 3 months. I've been using it with my Garmin smartwatch and I've been tracking my points and have been doing light gym workouts . I've lost 25.4 pounds so far and am juicing my way past difficult hurtles. This is a great app for tracking points and also how exercise has an effect on points. If you want something bad enough, you have to work for it.

recentChanges: Summary refresh fix
comments: Firstly, "real date scaling" should be default, not a setting that needs to be turned-on in "Preferences." Accurate Graphs 101. I use this app to record/track my geriatric cockatiel's weight. (Weight is a key indicator of health for a bird, any sudden/drastic weight changes can be a sign of serious health issues.) So I wish I could specify grams as the unit (current options are pounds or kilograms, which makes sense for human weights), though this is not a deal-breaker. Super easy & convenient.

Dont love that I have to close app and reopen to see the updated trends in weight after I enter a new one but the app is free simple and easy to use so it's still worth it. A lot of the good features of course come on the paid version including being able to put in a goal weight which is a pretty simple feature that I think should be free but hey they have to make their money right

Great app, is exactly what it says it is. I paid for premium to get the goal forecast. No adds and no fluff. My only request is that the app will rotate sideways with my screen so I can get a better look at the graph when it has alot of entires.

I purchased premium version of this app to see the forecast date of my goal. However, it's showing '-' as a forecast date after entering today's weight. Edit: I've added 20 records before purchasing the premium version. Do I have to add more to see the forecast? Second Edit: The app devs are prompt in response. Their app doesn't support weight gain goal forecast. That's the reason I was not able to see forecast date. So they quickly refunded the purchase amount. -1 star for not supporting gain.

Does what it says. Simple and to the point. Enter weight (change date if weight relates to date different than today), write a note (optional) related to the entry. The app plots weight evolution vs time.

title: Calorie Counter by Lose It! for Diet & Weight Loss
description:
Lose It! is a calorie counter & food diary diet app that helps you stick to your diet and reach your goal weight. Simply download the app, set your goals and track your diet, food and exercises to lose weight. Easily track macro, carb and calorie intake with Lose It! calorie counter & food diary app!

Since our launch in 2008 we have been featured in The Wall Street Journal, The Today Show, Men‚Äôs Health, Women‚Äôs Health, CNET, Buzzfeed, CNN, Shape, Good Morning America, and more.

‚Ä¢ 80+ million pounds of weight lost by our members (and counting)
‚Ä¢ 27+ million searchable food items in our comprehensive international food library database 
‚Ä¢ 40+ million users who have started their weight loss journey with Lose It!
‚Ä¢ 25+ macro nutrient, carb, calorie and health goals to choose from
‚Ä¢ 3 days of calorie and diet tracking is all it takes before a user starts to see a result in weight loss

Stay on track of your diet and calorie intake with Lose It! Calorie Counter. Whether it be a keto diet, vegan diet or anything in between, Lose It! will help you track your macro, carb and calorie intake to reach your weight loss and health goals. Stop making excuses ‚Äì start losing weight with Lose It!

HOW THE LOSE IT! CALORIE COUNTER & FOOD DIARY APP HELPS YOUR WEIGHT LOSS JOURNEY

Lose It! isn‚Äôt your average calorie counter and food & diary app. Lose It! uses the proven principles of calorie counting and tracking to help you succeed. To get started, input your profile details and we‚Äôll calculate the daily calorie budget best for you. Next, easily track your food, weight, and activity and get ready to celebrate your weight loss victories. Gain insight on your macro, carb, protein, sugar, fat and overall calorie and food intake on a daily level. Stay on top of your keto, vegan, vegetarian or whole 30 diet! There‚Äôs no easier way to change your calorie and diet habits and learn about your nutrition needs. 

LOSE IT! CALORIE COUNTER FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Barcode Scanner ‚Äì quickly scan food barcodes or search our database to track your carb, macro and calorie intake.
‚Ä¢ Snap It ‚Äì Want to know your carb count after that burger? log food by simply taking a photo of your food. Just tap the camera icon for food tracking and calorie counting in a snap. 
‚Ä¢ Track Nutrients ‚Äì track more than just calories including macro, protein, water, carb, sugar, body measurements, sleep cycles, and more. Stay on top of your keto, vegan or vegetarian diet needs! Learn what nutrients you need along your weight loss journey.
‚Ä¢ Fitness App Syncs ‚Äì connect trackers, apps, and devices like Fitbit trackers, Misfit trackers, Garmin trackers, Withings scales, Google Fit, Healthkit, and more.
‚Ä¢ Challenges ‚Äì step up your game with fun weight loss, fruit/veggie, health and exercise challenges by yourself or with your friends.

recentChanges: We did some reorganizing this week and moved friend requests and group invites to the Community section of your Profile.
comments: Please help! No matter what I do the app continues to change my starting weight. So while I lost weight this week it shows that I gained weight. I am not on premium because I really just need a simple food tracking app as I'm doing alternate day fasting. It's just a little discouraging to have the app showing me I gained weight when I lost weight. I changed it twice before I started as it kept somehow going back to a different starting weight. 30 pounds less than I am!

Easy, not crowded with ads, connects to Strava if you pay. It is only $40 a YEAR. I havent upgraded yet, but thinking I will. I like the barcode scan option. Havent used the food photo yet. Has all I need. No pestering coach, but it does send a notification like once a day if it has been a while since you recorded. I like a little reminder, but not one ever hour as some apps seem to do. So far, I like the app. Much better than the other free one I tried.

Very good app. I feel it is worth the price for premium. Previously I was using MyFitnessPal until the bugs just became too much. The one area that needs improvement is search. While it works most of the time there are enough times searching doesn't happen when inputting info. Latest example: cauliflower pizza returned chips, cookie, mashed potatoes, amazing greens, etc... This is version 12.1.700 (11037).

Lose It! has been a great help in my progress to keep track of my food intake. The site offers good advice for health as well. There are many features which would take long to describe, and there's been the occasional crash of the app, which doesn't surprise me. But overall, Im very pleased with Lose It! I have tried to reach out to Lose It staff to ask questions not on the website. I'm a bit disappointed for no response. That said, Lose It! seems to be the best at what I need.

This app used to be great, but not so much anymore. They've taken away standard features and only made them available in the premium upgrade. My Fitbit only syncs in premium now. I'm also really disappointed that you can no longer see all of your daily nutrition amounts, only fat, carbs and protein. You can no longer see sodium, sugars, fiber, etc. I've used this app for years, otherwise I'd look for another one.

comments: The exercises are well described, with short videos if you require, and are "easy" to follow. The only accessories required is a floor mat and a chair. Intensity ramps up with time. Tracking of your progress is clear. It gave a decent result, yet no visible 6 packs... On the improvement side, the App is somehow a one time use only. If you want to redo some exercises after the first 30 days, you don't get the same follow up of your progress.

I've been enjoying exercising to this app. The calendar keeps me motivated and accountable. I wish there was more to it after you complete the 30 days. This developer has a plethora of different apps revolving around fitness and if they consolidated them into one or few apps, it would've been very good. You could still charge per section within the app.

Great Results, it allows you to achieve your ideal weight without much strain or excessive work that leaves you exhausted and to feel dead at the end of the day. Instead it gives you your own personalised training schedule and helps you to stay in line of your goals that way too, as an added benefit. All in all, a great app

Didnt think this would work. But I thought , if I want give up 5 to 10 mins a day something is wrong. Started beginners now moved on to intermediate. People gave commented on my shape. I can now get back into my suit, instead of buying a new one. The app is customisable and tracks your progress. Personally I thi k its great fir people on the go or have limited time to work out. Give it a go folks, nothing to loose only weight and gain a new shape. Thanks

I really like this app. I bought the app to do away with ads. I've used this app for two weeks, and I used the same company's ab workout app for a month, and I have lost five pounds (my goal is 15), and my core strength has improved considerably. I like how there are different levels of strenuousness. I've been on intermediate, and I think I'll go up another level in March. I like almost all the exercises, and for the few I don't like (like jumping jacks and sit-ups, I just sub in. Five stars!

title: Weight Diary - Weight Loss Tracker, BMI, Body Fat
description:
‚ûú Do you need help to reach your target weight‚ùì
‚ûú Are you trying to lose weight or put on some muscles‚ùì
‚ûú Do you want to track your weight progress, BMI (Body Mass Index) and body fat‚ùì

Then this is the app for you: üëá

 üî• A simple weight tracker with ALL THE FEATURES YOU NEED to support you in your weight journey and keep you motivated to reach your goals üî• 

With this app you can:

üìâ Keep your body at glance by monitoring your progress in a beautiful chart.

üìù Continuously verify the success of your diet  with customisable weight journals which show only the information you care about.

ü§≥ Attach a photo to your recorded weight.

üë¨ Generate ‚ÄúBefore and After‚Äù photos of your body transformation. 

üîé Analyse your latest BMI, Body Fat percentage and Ideal Weight. 

üéØ Set a weight goal.

üíØ Receive customised feedback  on your progress.

üîî Set reminders to weight.

üíæ  Backup your data on the SD card or transfer them to your new phone via email. 

üìä  Create Excel spreadsheets to analyse your progress on PC or to share it with your doctor/dietitian via email.

‚öô Choose your preferred measurement unit (kg, cm/ lbs, inches/ stones, inches). 

üì≤ Create Monthly, Weekly and Daily ‚ÄúWeight Tracker cards‚Äù of your progress ready to share with your friends or social media followers (#weighttracker)


üëâ If you like our app üòç please support our work with a ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ-review!

üëâ For any feedback or issues, please email us üì© at contact@selantoapps.com or directly via the feedback screen within the app.



______________________________________________


üîÖ RememberüîÖ

Weight loss is a long term journey and a lifestyle change. Experts suggest that you should aim to lose no more than than 1 kg (2.2 lbs) a week to keep your body from regaining the weight you have lost once you are ready to maintain. This app allows you to keep track of your BMI, body fat percentage and overall weight loss so you can monitor how much weight you are losing each weigh-in.

‚ùóNote about BMI, Body Fat and Ideal Weight ‚ùó

Please don‚Äôt leave a bad review if you find the app's calculations are incorrect. BMI, Body Fat % and Ideal Weight calculations within the app are estimations based on your inputted data and are based on commonly used scientific formulas (described in the app). These calculations have limitations as they are based on the average body type and do not take into account the differences. For more accurate results, please see an expert (such as a personal trainer) and then enter your correct measurements manually into the app.

comments: Good way to track weight with meaningful metrics, tracking reminders, nice encouraging words, ways to make it personal and a convenient export/import data feature via an excel document. I would like to see something more though, like maybe tracking the person's activity through the phone's sensors and advising behaviours to help meet the target weight, diet suggestions, workout suggestions and also automated, motivating workout notices based on the goals.

Does what it says. Ads are annoying, but for the cost of a donut or two (which you should be skipping anyway if you are using this app) you can go premium. The export/import feature was a nice touch too, as I just upgraded phones and wasn't looking forward to reentering a bunch of data. 5/5

This app do not have statistics what so ever , not even average weight. The only calculation done is BMI, and believe it or not, fat procentage. One wander how that's done. Withdrawing one star, render it with only one Three minutes after installation one is asked to take a stand about the app, and if one want to pay or continue receive a ton of ads. It ought to be a law against such conduct. I'll deal with it later

I really like this app. Like how it tracks your body fat and BMI, also like how it has a graphs your weight. Vary easy to use and vary simple. I also like how you can customize the color. The only thing I don't like is when you put in the time you can't put in AM or PM. The clock goes from 1 to 23.

I'm adding 4 stars because I am new user to this application and thank you for your wonderful effort. But I suggest and it will be more help if there is fasting tracker option to motivate users when supposed to eat and how many hours of fasting such Intermittent fasting, thank you and more powerüëç

title: Calorie Counter - MyFitnessPal
description:
Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet MyFitnessPal has you covered. Our members have lost over 200 million pounds and 88% of people who track for at least 7 days on MyFitnessPal lose weight. Sign up for FREE and start living a happier and healthier life today!

See for yourself why MyFitnessPal is the world‚Äôs most popular health and fitness app.

‚ñåTRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY 
‚ñ† Biggest Food Database -- 11+ million foods in our database including global items and cuisines. 
‚ñ† Barcode Scanner -- Simply scan barcodes to log foods. 4+ million barcodes recognized. 
‚ñ† Recipe Importer -- Easily import the nutrition information for the recipes you cook.
‚ñ† Restaurant Logging -- Quickly log menu items from your favorite restaurants.
‚ñ† Food Insights -- Learn how to make healthier choices about the foods you eat. 
‚ñ† Personalized Experience -- Create your own foods, recipes, and meals and save favorites. 
‚ñ† Calorie Counter -- We automatically calculate the calories in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Macro Tracker -- We automatically calculate the macros (carbs, fat, protein) in your foods, meals and recipes.
‚ñ† Track All Nutrients -- Calories, macros (carbs, fat, protein), sugar, fiber, cholesterol, vitamins, and more.
‚ñ† Customize Your Diary -- Log breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks or create your own meals. 
‚ñ† Water Tracking -- Log water in cups, ounces or ml. We save your recently logged amounts.

‚ñåREACH YOUR GOALS
‚ñ† Choose A Goal -- We support weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance goals.  
‚ñ† Goal Setting -- Create your own goals or let us create personalized goals for you, including calorie and macros goals.
‚ñ† Change Habits -- It's almost like having a nutrition coach right inside your pocket.

‚ñåLOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS 
‚ñ† Connect 50+ Apps & Devices -- Syncing your workouts is easy and automatic.
‚ñ† Choose From 350+ Exercises -- Or create your own exercises and workouts. 
‚ñ† Log Cardio Exercises -- Including running, walking, biking, swimming, yoga, pilates and more. 
‚ñ† Log Strength Exercises -- Including sets, reps, and weight per set. 
‚ñ† Track Steps -- Set a daily step goal and see a graph of your step history. 
‚ñ† We connect with all your favorite apps and devices -- Including Fitbit, Jawbone UP, Garmin, MapMyFitness, Runkeeper, Strava, Runtastic, Misfit, Withings, HealthKit, UA Record and many more!

‚ñåGET SUPPORT AND MOTIVATION 
‚ñ† Add Friends -- Connect with friends for an extra layer of support and accountability.
‚ñ† Join Our Community -- Find motivation, support, tips, and advice in our active forums. 
‚ñ† Newsfeed Updates -- Share your accomplishments and see friend‚Äôs progress in the newsfeed.

‚ñåCELEBRATE YOUR SUCCESS 
‚ñ† Chart Your Progress -- Stay motivated with a graph of how you‚Äôre improving over time.
‚ñ† Progress Photos -- Add photos to your weight entries to see and celebrate your progress. 
‚ñ† Nutrition Reports -- View a history of your calories, macros, and nutrient intake. 
‚ñ† Share Your Progress -- Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey.

Download MyFitnessPal and start living a happier and healthier life today!

For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://account.underarmour.com/privacy?locale=en

comments: I can't change my photo, it still shows me 169 days streak and it's always crashing and freezing. I reinstalled the app - didn't help, so I deleted my account and created new one and I am still experiencing the same issues. In the past it didn't take so much data, but now it takes about 700MB monthly just because of some useless features. This app has been ruined down in the present. The simplier was the app the better it was. Please, give us back our old good MyFitnessPal. (1 year experience)

My gym recommended this supposedly free app. All of a sudden, I'm charged 84.99. No notice, just automatically charged through Google Play. I filed a fraud claim with my bank, got a new debit card. Meanwhile, I'm still trying to cancel a subscription I never agreed to, however, I'm sent on a wild goose chase of links that never take me to a page where I can cancel or get a refund. Absolute bullsh#t

The app is nice and helpful. I'm giving 3 stars because it's annoying that there are now large ads on the home page. This normally wouldn't bother me, however they are huge mugshot pictures. Not something I want to see everytime I open the app. I would hate to have to delete the app because I really do like it. If you can change this that would be great and I would be more than happy to leave a 5 star rating.

The reliability of the app has totally fallen off recently. Don't even think about trying to use the barcode scanner... glitches out and shuts down the app every single time! Freezes and stops working right in the middle of trying to create a recipe so you have to keep trying again from scratch. Super annoying.

Great app! I'm using it as a weight loss tool that gives me valuable information about my calorie intake, breakdowns in macro and micro and keeps me on track with my goals. I love it! Only reason I gave it a 4/5 is that it asks for a paid subscription to download the data and go deeper with analysis.

description:

This app offers a quick and simple way to track your weight. It calculates your BMI (body mass index) and allows you to set a target weight to help motivate yourself.

summary: An easy way to track your weight in either lbs, stones & lbs or kg
recentChanges: Improvements to the screen design and some minor bug fixes.
comments: This is excellent in my opinion. Quick & simple to use & understand which is what I wanted. Allows you to back up records if you wish just in case which is a feature I like. Particularly like the displays with the markers for the BMI which tell you how far away you are from the healthy green zone. One small amendment I would suggest is to have an action start date so you could see the difference from that point when starting dieting & exercising rather than 1st weight log. Brilliant app though.

I have downloaded a few of these apps over time and wasn't impressed with any, but I like this because it is simple. Giving you all you need without a lot of unnecessary graphs and information. You can track your BMI and you have a simple graph to see your weight loss progress.. it also lets you input your weight in stones and pounds too. So it's ideal for me.

Great weight tracker. Easy UI & free. Easy to understand formats even with a gauge for how much you've got left until you reach a healthier category in BMI! Customisable measurements for height & weight displayed etc. Notes section too. Idea; It would be even better if you could enter body measurements to track too - I can use the notes section but it'd be nice to see the measurements displayed like the weight changes so you can see the improvements or where you need to get back on track.

Simple. No fancy unnecessary stuff. No ads. No purchases required. No log on. No internet needed. No social - I'm a private person and psychology advice is don't share your goals with others! The key number shown is PERCENTAGE ACHIEVED which is a number that goes UP rather than down. Psychology advice is an INCREASING NUMBER is more motivational than a decreasing number. Obviously starting at 0% is a bit disconcerting but within days the number starts going up and up. Also notes area for diary.

Easy to use and gives a clear and very helpful representation of both your progress to your target weight and how this fits in with BMI & weight range guidelines, all of the information you need can be read at a glance by scrolling through the 3 screens

title: Weight Scale Estimator
description:
Yes, it is possible to get an estimation of an object weight by using your phone/tablet device! Currently, there are no sensors for weight measurement on Android TM devices but we came up with an innovative method to accomplish this task by using paper that acts as a weight sensor! 
This app, however, represents a proof of concept and you should not expect a high precision from the measurement. Please download it and give us feedback to help optimize the algorithm. 

This estimator weight scale app works as a:
Weight scale in grams:  With limits between 10 ‚Äì 500 grams
Weight scale in pounds: With limits between 0.022 ‚Äì 1.1 lbs
Weight scale in ounces: With limits between 0.352 ‚Äì 17.64 oz

 Some extra tools findable in every house are needed in order to make it work: 
-	A 0.5 Liter water bottle (filled with water) 
-	Two pieces of A4 paper (the ordinary white papers you use every day)

The 0.5-Liter bottle is used to calibrate the weight scale mobile app but in case you do not possess such a bottle, you can still calibrate with another object of your choice with a weight specified by you (find details on settings menu). 

That‚Äôs all you need! 
Watch the short explanatory video where you will find the simple instructions you need to follow in order to start using the weight balance estimator as a digital scale weight grams, digital scale weight pounds or digital scale weight ounce. 
Download our weight scale app to get the cell phone weight scale estimator. The instructions on how to use the free digital weight scale estimator as a kitchen weight scale can be found inside the app too but by watching the video you can get a better understanding. 

We are reasonably confident that by following the instructions at your best you can lower the error to 10-15% of the object mass.

You can use this electronic scale balance app as a digital scale weight for your phone to estimate the weight for objects that do NOT exceed 500 gr /1.1 lb / 17.64 oz. If you try to put weights greater than that, the phone weight scale estimator will stop measuring. These limits help avoiding screen scratch and are wide enough to let you estimate the weight through our weight scale app in grams, in pounds or in ounces of all ordinary fruits or other kitchen ingredients. It works admirably as a kitchen weight scale app.

In case you want to use the electronic weight scale to estimate the weight of other items like liquids or sugar/salt, follow these two simple steps:
-	Take an empty bowl and measure its mass.
-	Put the liquid/sugar/salt into the bowl and look at the weight difference into the phone weight scale.

In one app, you can find a triple tool: a weight scale app in grams, a weight scale app in pounds and an ounce weight scale app.

Remember to use this app with caution because it does not give you the precise or exact value of your object weight but an estimation of that value.

We really hope you will enjoy this digital balance scale estimator and find it useful for your everyday tasks. Please consider rating and commenting if you enjoy it.

title: Weight Track Assistant - Free weight tracker
description:
Do you want the ideal weight? Check it easily with the app. It's an useful tool to help you track weight daily and archive your weight goal. Whether you want to lose weight or gain weight, tracking your progress is very important. When you log your weight, it will calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI), body fat percentage, BMR and let you know if you are underweight, in good weight or overweight. In addition that you can track you weight three times a day to get the accurate weight. Then you can set your goal and record daily weight. And your weight will be displayed by a weight chart, so you can instinctively check the change of your daily weight and the degree of achievement for your goal.

In addition, to prevent the loss of body weight records, increasing the cloud sync feature. When you use an application more than thirty days, the weight recorded over thirty, the application will open cloud storage feature.

- Very user friendly UI.
- Real time BMI/Body Fat Percentage/BMR/Waist to hip ratio(WHR) value.
- Track weight three times a day.
- Detail weight statistics
- Daily weight track and weight goal setting
- Weight chart to view your weight progress
- Cloud synchronization function to prevent data loss
- Imperial and metrics units.

In addition, to prevent the loss of body weight records, increasing the cloud sync feature. When you use an application more than thirty days, the weight recorded over thirty, the application will open cloud storage feature.

- Very user friendly UI.
- Real time BMI/Body Fat Percentage/BMR/Waist to hip ratio(WHR) value.
- Track weight three times a day.
- Detail weight statistics
- Daily weight track and weight goal setting
- Weight chart to view your weight progress
- Cloud synchronization function to prevent data loss
- Imperial and metrics units.

comments: I've loved this app since the first day I used it. Perfect for me and it makes my weight loss/maintenance much more enjoyable. There's a lot of functions I find useful. Especially the panic button! That's saved me from ruining my day so many times... Thank you! Very wonderful app. So many features I never want to go without... Which is why I even opted for the paid version haha. I never do that, but tjis app is worth it. Seriously.

I had this app on my old phone and lost over 20lbs. I stopped using it and gained it all back. Now I'm using it again and lost 8lbs already. This app is a fun and very helpful tool for food addicts like me. It makes me be accountable for what I'm eating and how much I'm exercising. I just wish you didn't have to start the app over, including $, when you switch phones. Overall a terrific app!

Started off well but went down the drain pretty quickly - paid the ¬£5 one off charge for extra features that I didn't get full access to. I've been trying to contact the development team since October about this,without any reply. Prior to paying, I contacted them to ask if the ¬£5 charge was a one off payment and they replied straight away..The app is missing so much in terms of foods, exercises, and there is so much content that you can't access without paying - uninstalled now for a better app

This app is not as fancy as others, it doesn't track protein or carbs when you make your food diary entries. But it definitely gets the job done. Honestly I would recommend this calorie counter app to anyone because it's so easy to navigate. And has features like the panic button, before and after pics that you can upload. if there is a food item that's not listed in their log you can type it in and also login the calories and amount that you consume and it will save. So far I have lost weight.

Excellent! I used to go to slimming world and now that I have found My Diet Coach app, it is absolutely brilliant, it helps to motivate me and I love the fact that you have a panic button on the app if you have cravings, it is my first day today so fingers crossed it will help me lose weight ü§û

title: Casual dieting-weight manager-
description:
New weight-management app with very popular cute illustrations from Japan!

This is a must-see for everybody who has ever tried a weight-management app without being able to actually stick with it!
The cute rabbit and Pisuke will casually support your diet this time!

[Characteristics]

1.- Cute graphs!
The illustrations that show up change depending on your weight's increase or decrease.
You can use the illustrations that appear on the graphs as stickers for the journal integrated within the app.
This ensures you won't feel depressed even if you gain some weight!

2.- Very complete journal function!
Not only you can keep a journal of your weight and body fat, but you can also write what you ate along with daily happenings!
Over 100 different stickers that you can choose to use depending on your daily mood!
The more you use the app, the more stickers you get, so that you can continue to enjoy keeping a daily record!

3.- You can use the stickers as wallpapers!
You can download the stickers that you used on the journal as wallpapers!
5 backgrounds available to choose from as well!
Keep writing on your journal to complete your wallpaper!

4.- Ideal for those who:
- want to go on a diet
- are looking for a healthy way to manage their weight
- just had a rebound after a diet
- always give up after dieting for a while
- find that regular journal apps are not enough
- are looking for cute wallpapers
- love cute illustrations
- like Kanahei
- use the LINE sticker series "Pisuke & Rabbit" a lot!

[A request from the app]
We would appreciate it if you would contact us regarding any malfunction of the app via the "Contact" option available within the "Others" menu in the app. If you report errors in your review, we may not be able to further inspect the issue. We appreciate your cooperation in helping us to improve our service!

comments: Very cute and motivational app. I love it. Would be great if you could set multiple goals to reach over a longer period of time. For example, I know the weight I want to reach by the end of the year, but setting smaller goals in the meantime will help keep me positive and on track. If smaller goals were introduced, it would be nice if there was something else you got for succeeding, like in your other app where you unlock stories, but better stories please!

Honestly my favorite weight tracking app that I've been using for years. Let's you record your weight, body fat % everyday and it creates a graph based off your weight over time. You can set goals as well as choose a cute sticker that represents your mood everyday.

App is cute and useful. I like that there is a diary, chart and stikers for a good mood. Of the minuses, there is no automatic calkulator of the % of fat in the body. Each time you need to calculate and enter manualy. I would also like a function to enter body parameters.

Very cute and tremendously helpful app. I've already lost 10ibs and I think a lot of it had to do with getting a good visual on my progress, and the overall gentle approach it had to your bad days / the excitement on your good ones.
I'M SO SAD ;D; it deleted all my progress from last year! I was 163 at the beginning of last year and I'm 127 now and I was hoping to see the graph but everything got wiped, even diary entries. ):

title: Weight tracker, BMI Calculator
description:
Whether you want to lose or even gain a bit of weight it is always complicated to track and monitor the evolution while understanding what are the things that work for you. You might have a goal that you want to reach or maybe you just want to get back to your initial weight after a pregnancy, so having the right tool can really help you efficiently get to your ideal weight.
With simplicity and user friendliness in mind we've created a weight monitoring and BMI(body mass index) calculator application that not only let's you add your daily measurements but also gives you the possibility to log your daily moods, remarks and even add pictures, making this a perfect weight diary.

To make it perfect and at the same time simple, we've included the following key features:

Weight Tracker & Monitor
 - daily weight register functionality
 - main screen calendar with great overview on the logged days
 - possibility to log your weight for previous dates - copy your previously saved data into the application
 - easy navigation between days - see your day to day progress
 - evolution chart with custom date range functionality - watch you weight loss progress
 - desired weight - follow and reach your health goals
 - custom units of measurement - choose from kg(kilograms), lbs(pounds) and st(stones)
 - custom notes on a daily basis - register calories, diets, ideas and more.
 - add pictures functionality - for before and after moments
 - main screen cards for current and desired weight - never forget your goals.
 - total lost weight card for selected period
 
 
BMI Calculator
 - simple yet very comprehensive body mass index diagram
 - BMI values for your day to day measurements
 - main screen card with current BMI
 - preview BMI ranges - from extremely underweight to morbid obesity


Other cool features
 - password protection - protect your data with a 4 digit PIN code
 - reminder - helps you remember to daily register your data
 - age and gender - for more accurate BMI calculations
 - custom units of measurement for height - choose from cm(centimeters) and ft(feet)
 - first day of week, choose between Monday and Sunday
 - data reset functionality - start over whenever you want

If you are already looking for an application similar to this, it means your are on the right track in getting a better & healthier life, so we can only wish you to:
Be happy and live healthy!

title: Ideal Weight - BMI Calculator & Tracker
description:
Just do it --

That's what they tell you, but it isn't always that simple. It is with Ideal Weight(TM), the best daily weight tracker and BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator. 

The Tracker:

Ideal Weight lets you see the most important information at a glance. Use the slider to select your weight, and the tracker will calculate your BMI (weight range) using our signature Weight Wheel. The app will automatically save your data every time. It's that easy.

Our graphs show you exactly what you want to know in seconds. The monthly view helps you see the effects of recent diet choices on your weight, while the 3-month and yearly views let you monitor and track your progress over time. Ideal Weight is the easy and fast way to reach your weight loss goal, so you can control your weight faster and without stress.

Easy to start:
-Enter your gender, age and height
-Use the slider to select your current weight, and you're done

Easy to keep it going:
-Effortless -- the app saves the last weight you left the slider on, every time.
-3 colorful graphs -- 1 month, 3 months, 1 year
-Easily change your stats, like age, height, or preferred units

The Calculator:

Simple, flexible, and perfect for checking anyone's BMI at a moment's notice. The sliding scales are easy, quick and satisfying to use! Just tap between the calculator and the tracker at the top of the app. You can even use the calculator without onboarding for Tracker.

Great for families. Perfect for healthcare professionals.


New Year's resolution? Getting ready for a wedding? We can help you change your weight with no stress. You only need your current body weight to get started.

Download Ideal Weight, and take your first step toward your goals.

title: Noom: Health & Weight
description:
Any program can tell you to eat less and move more. 

Noom is different.

Noom‚Äôs proven psychology-based approach identifies your deep-rooted thoughts and  triggers, and builds a custom game plan to help you form healthy habits, faster. 

Featured in the New York Times, Women‚Äôs Health, Shape, Forbes, ABC and more, we've already helped over 45 million people worldwide build health habits and achieve their health goals. 

People who use Noom lose an average of 18 pounds in just 16 weeks!
78% keep the weight off for over a year. 

Learn how to navigate your environment, challenge your thoughts, master your triggers, and overcome any barrier that might come your way.
Whether it's emotional eating, cravings at mid-day, difficulty with social eating, or a sweet tooth, Noom's scientifically backed-solution will help you create a plan to overcome any obstacle and practice healthier habits until you've mastered them!

comments: This is a great app! It is easy to use and follow. I loved all the aspects of the app; support from your personal coach, great recipes, log food and meals easy, step counter and much more. It really is the only app you would need. However, when the 14day trial is up it is a little expensive and remember that it is US funds. With our world in chaos it wasn't the right time for me to join for long term. This app really got me started to be accountable, so I found a free app to help me.

Good program Overall the program is good. The user interface could use some improvements. 1) The user should be able to directly enter the numbers instead of having to scroll. Too slow 2) Entering multiple meals at once requires too many clicks. The whole process needs to be stream lined. 3) Noon has it own idea what a serving size is, which doesn't match the manufacturer serving size, so all the calories counts are off. Very frustrating. The coaching and education side of things is good.

This app and program are working for me and I'm loving it. It's a balance of education, tracking food, group support, and it's all slowly delivered in daily lessons. I've lost 10 pounds in 4 weeks and the best part is that I'm learning how to eat healthy and make better decisions that I can carry forward after I reach my goal weight vs using some sort of crash diet and yo-yoing. There are some usability things in the app that I would love to see fixed, but it doesnt impact the program.

So far, this program has worked better than others I've tried. They don't have prepackaged meals to buy, but lots of recipes so you can make what you like or try something new. They teach you how to understand your eating and work at making the changes to maintain the weight loss. Been on the app for 4 weeks and have lost 16 lbs. Best of all I'm viewing what I eat differently. No food is off limits, but limit when and how much is the plan. I can have cake, but maybe once a week.

Account and subscription management is horrible. These things are not upfront and very difficult to change. If are taking part in the trial please note that you will be automatically put into a renewal program and be charged 106 dollars after the trial begins. There is no warning before this charge is made either. I ended up not using this program cause it wasn't for me, but the fact that account management is so tedious is a serious flaw in my opinion.

comments: I gave a 3 Star because, its needs a tab to add daily intake of calories. Weighing myself daily isn't ideal nor desirable task. There should also be a tab to add fluids. Along with muscle growth results. It's a good App with in what it does offer however these recommendations are throughout your reviews in total should be made. You're being giving the needs/wants of your customers on your lap, why would'nt the company make those changes?
Great for a basic weight tracker. You can calculate body fat and BMI. No diet tracking. Exactly what I was looking for
Easy and simple to use. Serves the purpose. One small requirement.. It would be great if we can export the data to spreadsheet or if we can share the data with others in a presentable fashion
Very simple app to use. Data entry is a breeze. It makes it easy to track your progress so you can make any needed adjustments to meet your goals!
Very clean, love the widget! Wish bodyfat percent was given room on widget instead of BMI (or option to change it if you have access to body fat scanner)

title: Libra - Weight Manager
description:
Libra tracks your daily weight changes and displays them in a beautiful interactive chart

- Simple data entry
- Scrollable, zoomable chart
- BMI
- Weight goal
- Time-to-goal estimate
- Daily KCal estimate
- Visualisation of your diet plan in the chart
- Statistics
- Import/Export to Excel (.csv)
- Synchronization with Withings (download only)
- Withings real-time push notifications
- Widget

Libra asks for the following permissions:
- Internet: Withings sync and showing ads
- Access network state: Required by the ads library
- Write external storage: Importing and exporting the database
- Receive boot completed: To reset the daily reminder on reboot
- Get accounts: Receive push notifications from the Withings service
- C2DM receive: Also required for push notifications
- Wake lock: Handling of received notifications

comments: The graphs are cool. People are happy with the data entry, but I hate it. I would much rather get a keyboard and type date and weight. I figured out how to import data, so I revised. I don't have pro. What is the difference between the different paid levels, just how satisfied we are, and how much coffee we want to buy?

I have been using this app since April 2016 and absolutely love it. My morning routine is shower, weigh, Libra. I also record my fasting blood glucose level and ketone level in the comment. Great record to take to my health practitioner.
Great app. There is a bug that needs fixing - When displaying different charts, if animations are switched off in phone settings, the screen is blank. Otherwise awesome.

Simple weight tracking. I love it because it's so simple so I can look at where you have been and where you are simply and easily. Without the fuss of getting to the right tab or if you change up your fitness apps.
The update on Feb 22 screwed up the forecast line. It no longer shows the correct goal!!! It shows the normal bmi goal weight instead! Update - thanks it is fixed.

title: WeightWar - Weight Loss
description:
WeightWar helps you to manage your weight and diet systematically.

It helps you to lose your weight successfully by recording your daily weight.
It provides you a variety of charts and statistics of your weight.

And you can see the progress of your goal at a glance.

And notification feature is provided.

comments: If you use all aspects of this program, you are destined to loose weight and inches to be a healthier person. The health checks really make you more aware of what is needed in your daily diet. This reminds me of the version of WW before they started taking good parts away in 2016. So glad I found this program and once again seeing the weight and inches decrease.

Wow! The app is a free, but I highly recommend going Pro! There is so much more information and the recipes are fantastic. Join a weight loss forum you'd enjoy. Everyone is encouraging and willing to share their success and struggles and even a recipe or two. Highly recommend!!!

I love itrack bites! I actually just cancelled my official WW subscription because I didn't like it as much. Overall itrack bites is more intuitive and user friendly, however, a couple of things I did like on the WW app that I'd love to see in itrack bites: ‚Ä¢ A separate button that quickly takes you to a 'zero point foods' list based on the plan you're on ‚Ä¢ The ability to track your daily steps as an activity Not on the WW app, but still waiting for Google Fit syncing capabilities!!

I like this app except for the fact that I paid for the pro version to get the restaurant guide as part of this app. But I saw when using it it simply says 1 serving next to every item. It doesn't give u the choice of choosing 16 oz 24 oz 12 oz or how much of something say 1 hot dog or 1 burrito, simply says 1 serving without any explanation in what that serving is so my costco hit dog 1 serving at 19 points. Seems a little high for a hot dog with no bun. Any suggestions, if not can I get refun

I've used this app for several years & several diet plans. I'm currently doing keto & it is helpful although I find that when I scan item, the results are mixed. Since this app has the ability to add my own foods, I just use that to enter corrected info. Overall a good, helpful app & worth the subscription fee.

title: Weight
description:
Set a healthy and realistic goal, if you‚Äôre looking to lose or gain a few pounds could be challenging. With this app, you can track your weight periodically and monitor your progress. Statistics and graphs will give you more insights, helping to reach your goals! You can set them by yourself, or ask for an advice to the app. In this case, it will take the suggested Body Mass Index (BMI), and then it will compute a possible weight and achievable date to reach it (Note: this does not substitute a professional medical advice). If you are on diet, the app could help you to collect data for your nutritionist or your dietitian.

You can associate your blood pressure and a note to each measured weight. You may also track multiple profiles, or use different profiles for different goals.

The app offers:

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Weight tracking  
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Support for multiple separate profiles
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Custom color for different profiles
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Backup on Google Drive‚Ñ¢
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Storage and modification of the measures and dates
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Metric (meters an kilograms) and imperial (pounds, feet and inches) measurement units
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Computed Body Mass Index (BMI), Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) using different formulas
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Statistics about weight variations and progress


This app is not meant to serve as a source of clinical guidance and is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice. If you are on diet, consulting a nutrition specialist may help you to define achievable and healthy goals.

comments: Integrates poorly with my fitness pal despite having an integration option. Has synced with it in the past, but unfortunately not sure how to force a sync (have removed and added sync). Thus, I can't get a sync with my Garmin (because to sync with Garmin I have to go through my fitness pal, ugh) anyway, I love the scale. Had it for years. App is also very good. Integrations suck. Basically, you'll have to hand input your data, which isn't all that bad. Just beware its an issue.

When it worked, it was great but now it's useless. I specifically wanted a scale that does everything this one does and keeps track of everything in one place. When I first got this, it was awesome. But now it's stopped pairing and nothing I try works. It's going to Goodwill because I'm passed the return window on it.

I had trouble setting a new goal weight. I could enter the weight but it wouldn't save. I emailed the developer and he said to reduce the size of my font on my phone a Google Pixel 2 XL, it worked after making the font smaller I could see the save button for my goal weight change. Hopefully this info helps others that were having the same trouble.

Blue tooth fails! I just bought the scale at the end of December. I have had the blue tooth fail on me 3 times. It isn't my phone since none of my other blue tooth devices have this issue. I had to uninstall & reinstall the app. The first 2 times it worked. This time it didn't. Waste of time & money!

Used to work ok, but can no longer get the scale to pair at all. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app, restarting the phone, enabling and disabling Bluetooth on the phone, restarting and factory-resetting the scale, but it still refuses to pair. Just spins for a while until the scale gives up and shows E1. Using a Pixel 3a on Android 10, and I pair to other Bluetooth devices regularly without issue. Totally useless app now.

title: BMI Calculator & Weight Loss Tracker
description:
Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on the relevant information on body weight, height, age and sex.

Stay motivated by tracking your daily weight and analyze your progress in various charts and statistics. 

Also use the included handy calculators to determine your Waist-to-Height Ratio (WHtR), Body Fat Percentage and Calorie Consumption (BMR + PAL).

Included features:
‚Ä¢ BMI calculation - classified by sex and different age ranges
‚Ä¢ Local storage to track your daily weight‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Analyze your weight history in various charts and visualizations to gain insights on the way to a better body image‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Set a desired target weight and follow your progress
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive statistics about your weight, i.e. your average weight or difference your starting and target weight.
‚Ä¢ A weight reminder that supports you to achieve your ideal weight‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Input weights in the metric or imperial unit system‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Sync your weight data with your Google Fit account

Check your body stats to find your ideal weight, because overweight and obesity are risk factors for diseases such as hypertension, heart disease and diabetes. It can also be used to find your healthy weight if you want to lose weight or are on diet.

More information about the BMI is available on the website of the World Health Organization (WHO).

Please leave a ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ-review if you like our app!

comments: Simple as just track your weight weekly or daily as you prefer.
I love this app, simple, straightforward motivation!!

I have been using this app since September of 2018 and it has been a great, simple tracking tool. My only dislike is that I got a new phone just recently and I cannot import my past year plus of data to the new phone. If I could transfer that information I would gladly give 5 stars.

Foreign data format only, not configurable. There is no way to set date format that you use in your country.   Update 06.01.2019:  1. I don't want to change language. I want to change date format.  2. Even for the same language there are different formats, e.g. in UK it differs from US.  3. Even for the same country there are different formats. E.g. in UK there are 2 formats that are used in most cases: dd/mm/yy and dddd-mm-yy. That's why any app that displays date MUST have date formatting option.

The app is concise and simple to use. I especially like the function of showing how much you have to go to reach your goal weight. I only have 20 more pounds to go (yay). Knowing your BMI is also very helpful to understand how much you should lose to your healthy weight.

title: Handy Weight Loss Tracker, BMI
description:

Now you will always have your body weight and BMI diary on hand. Any time you may check your progress in weight loss that will motivate you for future success. 

Weight loss is a long term undertaking. For maximum sustainable result in your body weight loss you should lose not more than 1 kilo a week. So you definitely need a good body weight and BMI ( Body Mass Index) diary to track you progress.

Knowing you BMI is a pretty useful thing during weight loss process. With your BMI you know exactly how healthy your body weight is. 

Your new Weight and BMI tracker holds your progress in the most efficient way ‚Äì as a diary and a graphic. Any time you may see all your weight loss progress. Observing you results is the best motivation for further weight loss!

descriptionHTML:
Tired of huge apps with tens of useless functions? So we are!

This app lets you track your body weight and your BMI. Period.

Enjoy minimal and handy interface!

Features:
‚Ä¢ Enter your body weight easily to the weight diary with a handy numberpicker
‚Ä¢ Track your BMI just by specifing your height in profile
‚Ä¢ Backup the data of your body weight recorder to SD-card and transfer it to your new smartphone
‚Ä¢ Choose how to display your progress - as a graph or a table
‚Ä¢ Add a comment for weighing

Now you will always have your body weight and BMI diary on hand. Any time you may check your progress in weight loss that will motivate you for future success.

Weight loss is a long term undertaking. For maximum sustainable result in your body weight loss you should lose not more than 1 kilo a week. So you definitely need a good body weight and BMI ( Body Mass Index) diary to track you progress.

Knowing you BMI is a pretty useful thing during weight loss process. With your BMI you know exactly how healthy your body weight is.

Your new Weight and BMI tracker holds your progress in the most efficient way ‚Äì as a diary and a graphic. Any time you may see all your weight loss progress. Observing you results is the best motivation for further weight loss!
Just step on the scale every day, put your body weight into the app and watch your weight going down and your BMI moving towards healthy value.

title: Walking & Running Pedometer for Health & Weight
description:
The Pacer App: ‚ÄúWalking & Running Pedometer for Health & Weight‚Äù syncs steps & calories w/ MyFitnessPal and Fitbit! Track your step, walking & weight loss with this free health counter. Lose weight and track walk distance and calories burned using 24/7 step counting from our pedometer, step counter & health tracker app.

Download the Pedometer app for free to turn your phone into your personal health and weight loss tracker! Lose weight with calorie burning guided fitness plans, step counting and activity tracking. Join our health, fitness and walking community and get fit and active!

How Pacer works:
-Just download, open and start walking. Our free step counter app will track your steps automatically if your phone is with you
-‚ÄúTrends:‚Äù Track your complete activity history (steps, calorie count, etc.)
-‚ÄúExplore:‚Äù Groups & challenges
-‚ÄúMe:‚Äù Track weight, habits and more. Sync w/ MyFitnessPal & Fitbit.
-‚ÄúPlan:‚Äù Daily exercise plans for your health goals

For Better Accuracy:
1. Go to "Pedometer Preferences" and adjust the Pedometer mode if the step counter is not accurately tracking steps
2. Add our app to your cleaning tool‚Äôs "ignore" list so the step tracker doesn't get shut down
3. No two people walk the same. Adjust step counter sensitivity if needed to improve walking tracker accuracy

Important Note:
Some phones just can‚Äôt count steps if the screen is off or locked. We try hard to support as many phones as we can. If these steps don‚Äôt solve your problem, your device could be the issue. Email our support and we‚Äôll work hard get your step counting back on track.

Just Download and Go
-No wristband or additional tracker hardware required. Count your steps with just your phone ‚Ä¶ and our counter is free!
-No website login needed. Just download our walking app to start counting steps and tracking calories burned.

Complete Fitness & Steps Tracking
-Built-in pedometer tracks your steps as you walk. The step counter works whether your phone is in your hand, pocket or purse
-Count steps, calories, distance and active time
-GPS activity tracker tracks outdoor fitness activities on a map
-Works with MyFitnessPal and Fitbit. Pedometer syncs activity data to MyFitnessPal and Fitbit creating the ultimate weight loss tool and step counter app
-All of these tracking features are free! True free step counting.

Powerful Fitness Plans
-Daily exercise plans designed by pro trainers to improve health, lose weight and stay active
-Exercise plans for all activity levels and health goals
-Step by step audio and video guided workouts

Groups and Events ‚Äì Motivation
-Create walking groups to burn calories together with friends & family
-Compete in events for motivation to walk and lose weight

Track your Health and Fitness Data
-Track your steps, activity and calorie burn. Make every step count and lose more weight
-Sync our tracker with apps like MyFitnessPal and FitBit for total step counting data and tracking

Create Healthy Habits
-One-tap tools to build health and fitness habits and beat weight loss goals
-Reach your goal: Walk more, Lose weight, or Improve health!

Other Key Features:
-The best pedometer for any phone
-Accurate steps & activity tracking
-Weight loss, BMI tracking and calorie burn counter
-Daily fitness plans for any health goal ‚Äì lose weight, walk more or improve health
-Trends displays daily steps, calories and weight
-Auto-sync steps and calories to MyFitnessPal or Fitbit

Count on Pacer Pedometer for the best free walk tracker. Try Pacer Pedometer first before you buy a Fitbit or other tracker! Pacer syncs with MyFitnessPal and other step counter apps for all of your health and step data in one tracking app. 

Syncing Pacer with Fitbit:
1.Set up your Fitbit App
2.In Pacer, tap: Me -> Data & Settings -> Apps & Devices and tap ‚ÄúFitbit‚Äù to connect
3.Log into both your Pacer and Fitbit accounts and authorize Pacer to write data to Fitbit
4.Your Fitbit is now connected to Pacer

recentChanges: Hundreds of Premium recipes added to the app - plenty of options for those going low-fat, vegan, keto, or gluten free. These tasty, easy, and healthy recipes were created by our Registered Dietitians, who love to cook and enjoy food. The recipes use simple, wholesome ingredients and 20 minutes or less of prep time. Cook and customize these recipes, the app will calculate your calories and nutrients. Enjoy your next meal and keep on logging!
comments: Terrific app for calorie counting and diet analysis. Very nice UI. Multiple ways to navigate. Never gets in your way. The free version has a ton of bells and whistles and is stable a fast. I gave it 5 stars because just the free version is really good. I'm not a big fan of premium subscriptions. I'd rather buy it straight out. I want to give these developers money, but not monthly. Perhaps they would consider giving monthly premium membership for logging foods in the database. It's a bit light.

App is very easy to use. I have been using it for only a few months to track my food, water, snacks, exercise, nutrition and weight. I really like the barcode feature, which makes it SO easy to log foods. Just create a quick profile and get started. I have even used the barcode to log foods and create personalized recipes. Highly recommend for someone wanting to lose weight or just stay fit.

It's a great app and I'll still use it over the competition but there are a few huge problems. 1. It doesn't understand a single barcode I throw at it. 2. It doesn't support Unicode characters. I understand that it's mainly meant for US users and it's not a big deal to enter all the barcodes myself but not supporting Unicode is completely unacceptable in this day and age.

Its super helpful, so far I've lost 2.8 lbs in 9 days so woo! Sometimes it's hard to get the right amount of food logged and it's not always practical to log in grams cuz I don't actually have time to weigh it out so I make a rough estimate. I love that it gives me little helpful tips and facts about my diet and I especially love that I don't feel like I'm on a diet, never hungry and honestly I'm feeling much more energized. Helps me make healthier food choices and I love it!

It's an excellent app if you don't cheat and very flexible for adding custom foods. Well impressed! I lost a shed load of weight, safely, in a short time. I say safely because the app gives you a nutritional breakdown of what you do eat so that any deficiencies re proteins, vitamins etc are highlighted. Although I've met my target it's an app that will remain very useful in the future.

title: My Weight Tracker, BMI
description:
Monitor your weight using an efficient interactive chart ! " My weight tracker " will help you to achieve your ideal weight. You will easily see the weight loss and the gain on the chart.

/!\ It is strongly recommended to make regular backups by email. This will avoid you to losing your datas in case of mishandling or crash of your device!

The app show automatically your BMI and your Body Fat %.

On the chart, you can display :
- BMI zone
- Body Fat % zone
- Weight goal
- Moving average
- Trend curve

On the chart you can also :
- see weight
- see note
- see rate (food & sport)
- see the difference between two points
- Zoom (X and Y)
- Scroll
- Take a screenshot
- Return to initial view by double tap
- ...

The home page show you : 
- Chart
- Last weight
- BMI
- Fat Body %
- Weight goal
- Trend
- Time-to-goal estimate
- Weight to loose or gain to achieve the goal

A widget is available in this version. This will provide you on the essential informations (Last weight, BMI, Fat Body %, weight goal, trend, time-to-goal estimate, and weight to loose or gain to achieve the goal).

The weight log, will show you : 
- the loss or the gain between two month or two weight
- the whole informations on the weight : BMI, Body Fat %, note and rate (sport and diet)

You can export and import your datas (by email or on your sd card) in order to share them on your different devices. You can also make a backup on your sd card.

"My weight tracker" is also suitable for pregnant women, but the BMI and Body Fat % are not adequate.

v3.0 :
- More datas available like the size of your waist, hip etc.
- New widgets with the choosen datas
- Change the BMI and body fat %
- See all your datas on only one screen and with several graph
- View your datas on a calendar
- Import / export with a csv file

v2.x :
- Adding icone for the sport and food histogram
- The scale of the curve and the scale bar are editable (Display optimized for smartphone or tablet in high definition)
- Visualization of the objective advancement 
- Add of histogramm for the rate (food & sport)
- Auto-zoom on the whole chart (Chart preferences)
v2.0 :
- Add weight with comment and rating (sport and food)
- Colored curve based on ratings
- Screenshot
- Add password
- Help (under construction)
- Settings on the page "Add" and "History"


You like our app ? You want to participate to its improvement ?
So contact us and be among the first to get the new release by becoming a beta-tester !

title: Lifesum - Diet Plan, Macro Calculator & Food Diary
description:
Diet plan, food diary, macro calculator, calorie counter and healthy recipes, all in one convenient place. Get healthy and feel great with Lifesum!

Looking to try a keto, fasting, paleo or sugar free diet? We have the perfect diet plans for any goal. Need a health tracker to stay in check? Fear not. We've got an intuitive food diary, macro calculator and tons of nutritional guidance.

Meal planner and macro tracker - TOP Lifesum features:
‚óè        Diet plan & diet tips for any goal - lose weight and eat healthy
‚óè        Keto, fasting, paleo, sugar detox and more diets & plans
‚óè        Calorie counter & food tracker with barcode scanner for easy logging
‚óè        Macro calculator - keeps tabs on daily macros, nutrition & calories
‚óè        Food planner - eat healthy food from delicious recipes for any plan
‚óè        Health tracker - stay on top of fitness and health

WEIGHT LOSS AND DIET PLAN
Lose weight with a personalized diet plan. Take our test to discover which food planner is the most suitable based on schedule and lifestyle. From fasting, paleo to sugar free diets and everything in between, we have the right plan to achieve any weight loss goal.

RECIPES AND MEAL PLANNER
Healthy recipes to support all meal plans. Stuck in a diet rut? Explore tasty keto recipes, beat cravings with a no sugar meal plan or search for paleo food lists and snacks. 

CALORIE COUNTER AND FOOD PLANNER
Calorie counter and food tracker functions provide an overview of daily nutritional values. Did a workout today? Go premium and sync Lifesum with FitBit, Runkeeper, Moves and other fitness apps.

FOOD DIARY AND MACRO TRACKER
Macros mythbusting. It's easy with our macro tracker - reach the right type of energy consumption with the macro calculator. Simply scan barcodes for macros and nutritional information, or enter manually.

title: Weight Loss Tracker - BMI Assistant
descriptionHTML:
Do you want to monitor your weight loss and your BMI?
Here is the perfect app to help you control your weight loss/gain or just maintain your ideal weight.

‚ñ∫ DIET MODE OR SIMPLE FOLLOW-UP
You use the app in diet or simple tracking mode to monitor your weight loss in a simple and intuitive way.

‚ñ∫ CUSTOM RESULTS
For personalized results, the app takes into account your height, age, gender, physique and level of activity.

‚ñ∫ CALCULATE YOUR IDEAL WEIGHT
The app allows you to calculate your ideal weight. It also allows you to calculate an ideal end date for your diet. You always have the option to enter the weight and end date you aim for to remain in control of your ideal weight.

‚ñ∫ VIEW YOUR PROGRESS EASILY
The application allows you to view your progress in the form of bmi gauge, weight table and weight chart. You can check your daily target, the weight lost, the weight remaining, the number of days spent and the number of days remaining.

‚ñ∫ CHECK YOUR LOSS OR WEIGHT GAIN
The application is suitable should you want to lose or gain weight. You control daily what you have to lose/gain to reach your ideal weight.

‚ñ∫ CALCULATE YOUR RECOMMENDED CALORIE ALLOWANCE
BMI Assistant calculates your recommended daily calorific intake, your daily energy expenditure, and your base level metabolism at rest based on your activity.

‚ñ∫ VARIOUS FEATURES
‚úì Entering your weight daily and adding comments for each weight;
‚úì BMI chart and graphical gauge;
‚úì View the tracking log;
‚úì Calculation of your ideal weight according to your gender and your physique;
‚úì Calculation of the reasonable end date for weight loss or gain;
‚úì Display of your daily target, the weight lost, the weight remaining, the number of days elapsed and the number of days remaining;
‚úì Calculation of your BMI (bmi = body mass index);
‚úì Calculation of your FMP(fmp = fat mass percentage);
‚úì Display of the average daily and weekly weight loss;
‚úì Calculation of recommended daily calorific intake;
‚úì Calculation of your daily energy expenditure;
‚úì Calculation of your base level metabolism at rest according to your activity;
‚úì Display of your weight variation in a graph;
‚úì Graph display weekly, monthly or in full;
‚úì Modification of the profile;
‚úì Follow-up mode or diet;
‚úì Multiple themes;
